entry.title: $1925 // Crown Heights beauty - renovated 1 bed on gorgeous tree block - no fee
entry.content:
Crown Heights beauty - renovated 1 bed on gorgeous tree block!

NO BROKER'S FEE!!!

- Short walk to Nostrand AC or Franklin C train
- Super close to Brooklyn's favorite - Prospect Park!!!
- Awesome restaurants, bars and cafes nearby like Mayfield, Catfish, King Tai, David's Brisket House & so many more!

- Newly renovated
- Heat & hot water included!
- Rooftop access
- Hardwood floors
- High ceilings
- One king size room and one queen size - both get tons of sun!
- Stainless steel appliances - microwave
- Tons of closet space
- Pets OK!

9/1 move in available
Just first & security to move in
MUST have good credit/good income - guarantors OK!

Text or call Kyle to view today!
